roleset.name: to make an assault, attack
roleset.note: ASSAULT-V NOTES: Member of Vncls judgement-33. (from assault.01-v)
ASSAULT-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb assault.01, OntoNotes grouping assault-n senses 1, 2, 3, 4; maps to VN class judgement-33. Framed by Claire. (from assault.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Osbourne 's spokeswoman says [0] Sharon was quote , `` viciously assaulted [*-1]and treated [*-1] at a hospital . ''

example.name: NP only, args 0 & 1
example.text: The Japanese assault on the luxury market

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: The commando's assault of the facility occurred under cover of darkness.

example.name: MNR only
example.text: The police record notes a decrease in sexual assaults this past year.

example.name: Metaphorical assault
example.text: The climbers attempted a late spring assault of Mt. Everest.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Pete Townshend screamed profanities at Woodstock immediately preceding his assault of Abbie Hoffman with his guitar.
